About

I am a fictional photographer based in Toronto, specializing in portraits as well as landscape shots. I also do some Astrophotography for fun. I have collaborated with renown clients such as Regional Geologic, SpaceY and TimeComplexity Magazine. Also my favourite sound is:

Actual "About" section.

My name is Alex and this website is part of a Web Dev. course I'm taking in year 3 uni. Images are courtesy of the talented people at Unsplash, the icons come from iconmonstr and the shutter sound was provided by InspectorJ (https://www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org.
